title: Understanding Model Complexity
description: In this lab, we will explore how model complexity influences both prediction accuracy and computational performance. We will be using two datasets - Diabetes Dataset for regression and 20newsgroups Dataset for classification. We will model the complexity influence on three different estimators:

meta.title: Understanding Model Complexity in Machine Learning
meta.description: Explore how model complexity influences prediction accuracy and computational performance using regression and classification datasets.
meta.keywords: machine learning, classification, model complexity, computational performance, regression
